name: airpub
description: a pure front-end blog platform powered by APIs and built upon love
author: turing <o.u.turing@gmail.com>

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs src/javascript/airpub.js src/javascript/directives/editor.js src/javascript/filters/marked.js src/javascript/controllers/global.js src/javascript/controllers/base.js src/javascript/controllers/archive.js src/javascript/controllers/single.js src/javascript/controllers/admin.js -o dist/javascript/airpub.min.js --source-map dist/javascript/airpub.min.js.map --source-map-url airpub.min.js.map
scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run serve
